info.title: DataForSEO Serp Api API
info.description: Access to DataForSEO Serp Api tools for SEO research and analysis

post.description: Get organic search results for a keyword in specified search engine

location_name.description:
full name of the location
required field
Location format - hierarchical, comma-separated (from most specific to least)
 Can be one of:
 1. Country only: "United States"
 2. Region,Country: "California,United States"
 3. City,Region,Country: "San Francisco,California,United States"

depth.description:
parsing depth
optional field
number of results in SERP

max_crawl_pages.description:
page crawl limit
optional field
number of search results pages to crawl
max value: 100
Note: the max_crawl_pages and depth parameters complement each other

device.description:
device type
optional field
can take the values:desktop, mobile
default value: desktop

people_also_ask_click_depth.description:
clicks on the corresponding element
        specify the click depth on the people_also_ask element to get additional people_also_ask_element items;

schema.description: search engine name, one of: google, yahoo, bing.
